name: Cozy Mountain Motel

reviews.text: There isn't a lot of choice in Austin, and I think I made the right one. The proprietor is working his way through the motel, remodelling the rooms. At the time of my visit, the front few rooms - which front right onto Main St - have been done, but the rest of the rooms are still very old fashioned and worn.
reviews.title: A mixture

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although this is on R50, and is therefore a quiet road at night, Main St is on a steep incline, so you are still going to get a few trucks grinding up hill in low gear right by your window - so my preference was a room at the back, even if they are still very old rooms. They are very small - but mine was clean, the bathroom and small tv worked well, and at $28+ tax I think I got good value for my money.
reviews.title: Great People

likes.liked: — Great beds and great nights sleep

description: Rooms are cozy. All rooms are non-smoking. Most feature pillow top mattresses. All have refrigerators, microwaves, Wi-Fi, TV with premium channels - HBO, ESPN, CineMax and Showtime. Heating and air-conditioning. Parking for large vehicles, semis and trailers. New owners since July '09. Sorry, no pets.
